fr.emse.simulator.world

Interface SimulationMap


  • public interface SimulationMap
    This interface is the type used by a MapFrame to graphically display a map. It is a 2-d grid containing cells that can be accessed using the get(int, int) method. When you want to display a grid, create a MapFrame with the map as a parameter, and use the MapFrame.repaint(int) method to refresh the display of the contents of the map.
    Author:
    Gauthier Picard (SMA/G2I/EMSE) : picard@emse.fr

      • get

        Cell get(int row,
       int col)
        This method returns the cell that is at the given position (row,col) in the map.
        Parameters:
        row - the row of the cell
        col - the column of the cell
        Returns:
        the Cell positioned at the given row and the given column
